channel.title: music on Mauro Gabriel
channel.description: Recent content in music on Mauro Gabriel

item.title: Fly Me To The Moon (In Other Words)
item.description: by Bobby Womack Fly me Fly me to the moon And let me play among the stars Let me see Oh I wanna see what spring is like On a-Jupiter On a-Jupiter and Mars In other words, hold my hand In other words, darling, i love ya Oh, fill Fill my heart with song I wanna sing for you darling For ever more baby You, are all that I long for

item.title: Donâ€™t Let Me Down
item.description: by Twisted Sister Look at you You’re my dream Are you all that you seem? Now you have what I need And what I believe Don’t tell me you’ll lose it ‘Cause I’ll have to leave Don’t let me down Don’t let me down Don’t let me down Don’t let me down What do I have to give Until you let me live? You’re all that I work for
